text: (ai rasool unase) poochho to ki (bhala) jo kuchh aasamaan aur zameen mein hai kisaka hai (vah javaab degen) tum khud kah do ki khaas khuda ka hai usane apanee zaat par meharabaanee laazim kar lee hai vah tum sab ke sab ko qayaamat ke din jisake aane me kuchh shaq nahin zarur jama karega (magar) jin logon ne apana aap nuqasaan kiya vah to (qayaamat par) eemaan na laengen
